experience.title: Financial Analyst
experience.description: - Frequently undertaking the meticulous compilation of Monthly Cash Flow Statements and the intricate reconciliation of Bank Statements, ensuring financial precision and transparency in the financial records.- Managing the Accounts Receivable procedures with a particular focus on ensuring compliance with Goods and Services Tax (GST) regulations concerning outbound transactions.- Thoroughly reviewing and providing authorization for entries meticulously recorded by the Accounts Payable team.- Engaging in the continuous process of financial result prediction, reevaluation, and root cause analysis for variances within the company's fiscal performance.- Overseeing the comprehensive orchestration of activities pertaining to both Statutory and Internal Audits, ensuring meticulous compliance with regulatory and organizational standards.- Accoladed with the prestigious 'Employee of the Year Award' in the years 2020 and 2022, recognizing my consistent excellence and contributions in the professional realm.- Regularly granted an annual performance incentive in recognition of my punctual and efficient task management, as well as my consistent support and collaboration with fellow team members, resulting in a substantial and merited salary increment.

experience.title: Financial Analyst Experience Program
experience.description: - Conducted in-depth research on TCS and Persistent Systems in the technology sector, analyzing operational dynamics, strategic initiatives, and market positioning.- Managed a virtual stock portfolio worth INR 2,00,000, showcasing financial acumen and investment strategies in a simulated fiscal environment.- Completed four meticulous investment banking case study projects, enhancing expertise in financial analysis and problem-solving within the investment banking domain.- Developed a comprehensive Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) Valuation Model for ITC Ltd., involving intricate analysis of prospective cash flows and financial value.- Achieved a perfect 100% rating in research work, reflecting unwavering dedication and meticulous methodology in academic pursuits.- Secured a notable 85% rating in challenging Investment Banking Projects, demonstrating proficiency in financial analysis and strategic thinking.- Scored an exceptional 98% in Weekly Revision Exercises, highlighting a commitment to scholastic excellence and consistent academic success.

experience.title: Human Resource Management Internship
experience.description: - Secured the sale of Lernx Lifetime Memberships to an impressive total of five students on the inaugural day, setting the highest record within the batch.- Spearheaded the recruitment of a remarkable 50 interns in a mere five days, an unparalleled feat within the first week, and subsequently expanded the intern team to a staggering 350 individuals over the course of two months.- Successfully orchestrated the comprehensive onboarding process for a centennial total of interns, ensuring their seamless integration into the organization.- Assumed the leadership of a sizeable team, comprising 50 interns, for a duration spanning one and a half months, effectively guiding and overseeing their contributions to our collective objectives.- Commenced the internship journey with resounding success, earning the prestigious "Certificate of Achievement - Honest Efforts in HRM Internship" for demonstrating unwavering dedication and sincere efforts within the very first week.- Distinguished myself further by attaining the "Certificate of Appreciation - Magnificent Performance and Accomplishment of Targets" for a remarkable performance and the successful attainment of targets in four out of eight weeks.- Garnered recognition as an outstanding performer, receiving the esteemed "Certificate of Appreciation - Outstanding Performer of the Week" that singled out my exceptional contributions and achievements during a designated week.

experience.title: Business Consulting Risk Service Line (Financial Services and Risk Management - FSRM) Intern
experience.description: I conducted in-depth research and crafted informative presentations on the following topics:A. Corporate Financing in China:- Explored diverse methods of securing capital in China's complex financial landscape.- Analyzed regulatory shifts, the role of state-owned enterprises, and the growth of the domestic bond market.- Examined cross-border financing strategies employed by Chinese firms.B. SEBI’s Risk Management Framework (RMF) for Mutual Funds:- Studied SEBI's robust risk management measures for the Indian mutual fund industry.- Focused on portfolio diversification, stress testing, and liquidity risk management.- Demonstrated SEBI's commitment to protecting investor interests.C. Treasury Centralization:- Explored the benefits of centralizing treasury functions, including cost savings and risk management.- Emphasized improved cash visibility and compliance.- Highlighted the role of centralization in strategic financial planning.D. Emergence of Structured Derivatives and Their Application:- Investigated the evolution of structured derivatives and their applications.- Discussed their use in risk management, custom hedging, and portfolio diversification.- Explored their role in risk transfer and complex investment strategies.
experience.description_html: I conducted in-depth research and crafted informative presentations on the following topics:A. Corporate Financing in China:- Explored diverse methods of securing capital in China's complex financial landscape.- Analyzed regulatory shifts, the role of state-owned enterprises, and the growth of the domestic bond market.- Examined cross-border financing strategies employed by Chinese firms.B. SEBI’s Risk Management Framework (RMF) for Mutual Funds:- Studied SEBI's robust risk management measures for the Indian mutual fund industry.- Focused on portfolio diversification, stress testing, and liquidity risk management.- Demonstrated SEBI's commitment to protecting investor interests.C. Treasury Centralization:- Explored the benefits of centralizing treasury functions, including cost savings and risk management.- Emphasized improved cash visibility and compliance.- Highlighted the role of centralization in strategic financial planning.D. Emergence of Structured Derivatives and Their Application:- Investigated the evolution of structured derivatives and their applications.- Discussed their use in risk management, custom hedging, and portfolio diversification.- Explored their role in risk transfer and complex investment strategies.

experience.title: Content Writing Internship
experience.description: - From the very outset, I distinguished myself by attaining the coveted "Star Performer of the Week" Award, a remarkable recognition that underscores my immediate impact and the exceptional caliber of my contributions. This rapid acknowledgment speaks to my unwavering dedication, innate talent, and capacity for excellence, setting the tone for my continued accomplishments.- I showcased my intellectual prowess through the creation and delivery of engaging case studies that delved deep into the stories of renowned entities such as "Nutella" and "Netflix." These presentations were the result of meticulous research, in-depth analysis, and the adept communication of intricate insights. Beyond these case studies, I offered a diverse range of informative content, enriching the knowledge pool of our audience. My commitment to crafting thought-provoking content and disseminating it in an engaging and enlightening manner reflects my passion for intellectual exploration.- As a proactive advocate for "The Story Lane," I played a vital role in augmenting the visibility and engagement of their Instagram page. Through a strategic approach to digital marketing and a keen eye for audience engagement, I contributed to the platform's expansion and influence. My dedication to this endeavor was not merely a testament to my marketing acumen but also a manifestation of my commitment to enhancing the reach and impact of the platform within the digital landscape.
